reviews.review_msg: I don't usually rate professor on this website and leave comment. but I want to leave comment for him in case someone mistake him when they first meet him. But It's too little space here. Overall, he's the first instructor i feel really care about student and thought of a lot of things for students. he has good heart though have strict attitudes.
Worst prof ever. He expects you to know everything. His exams are REALLY hard. Avoid him at all costs!
